description: Although this restaurant is not in the centre, if you’re looking for excellent fish (mostly from the Mediterranean) personally selected by the owner - chef, then it’s well worth the few minutes it takes to find a parking space here. Beautifully cooked food, which is simply prepared using top - quality produce.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
